name: Grand Canyon Explorer
description: Experience breathtaking views of the Grand Canyon with a full-day guided hiking and photography tour. Includes lunch and transportation.

name: European Castle Tour
description: Visit some of Europe's most iconic castles across Germany, France, and Austria in a 10-day immersive historical experience.

name: Great Barrier Reef Snorkeling
description: Dive into one of the world's most beautiful coral reefs. This tour includes boat transfers, equipment, and expert guides.

name: New York City Highlights
description: A perfect 1-day tour covering major NYC sights like Times Square, Central Park, and the Statue of Liberty. Includes metro passes.

name: South African Safari Adventure
description: Explore wildlife in their natural habitat on this 5-day luxury safari. See lions, elephants, and rhinos in Kruger National Park.
